name: The worst heroic adventure
description:
"The worst heroic adventure game" - Hope you're not expecting a epic saga of slaying fierce enemies or resucing princesses from towers. Maybe you're imagining dragon slaying warriors saving the world from a fiery destruction?

No. In this game you come back from a voyage where you've learnt a destructive leviathan has decimated the land. You must speak to the remaining living to learn what you must do in order to conquer this evil incarnation. If you ever do get the chance...

This was a submission that was apart of the MiniJam 79: One level limitation.  

I spent a few hours making this, came up with the concept on the spot and figured I'd do something probably a bit different than what others will do in this limitation. There's small minimal amount of text to read, but it was a pleasure to make nonetheless.
